column4: Can anyone help me? My ubuntu wont boot and it gives and error an leaves me in BusyBox, the error is here http://pastebin.com/861611, plz?
sounds like your second hard drive isn't being recognized
You could check if it is recognized in your BIOS, if it is formatted right...
Oh sorry, as n2diy pointed out it is your second partition that can't be found not hard drive. Sorry, my mistake
